roleset.name: give a warning

example.name: just the warning
example.text: Two antitrust agencies may face further cutbacks because of a complicated new funding device , some Democrats in Congress are warning .

propbank.arg: Two antitrust agencies may face further cutbacks because of a complicated new funding device

example.name: with entity warned
example.text: The issue has come to a boil in Newark , N.J. , where federal prosecutors have warned lawyers for Eddie Antar that if the founder and former chairman of Crazy Eddie Inc. is indicted , the government may move to seize the money that Mr. Antar is using to pay legal fees .

propbank.arg: that if the founder and former chairman of Crazy Eddie Inc. is indicted , the government may move to seize the money that Mr. Antar is using to pay legal fees

example.name: warning as PP
example.text: Bay Financial Corp. , Boston , which has been reporting big losses and warning of a possible bankruptcy - law filing , said it was sued by a holder .

propbank.arg: of a possible bankruptcy - law filing

example.name: warning as infinitive
example.text: Mr. Thompson projected that Anheuser 's statement of intent could simply be a means of warning competitors to ease up on price - cutting or face a costly and fruitless battle .

propbank.arg: to ease up on price - cutting or face a costly and fruitless battle

example.name: ARG0 and ARG2
example.text: Beside a road in Emei Rural Township in Hsinchu , the kind of narrow , winding mountain road where you need to beep your horn continually to warn possible oncoming cars around the corner , in the home that he and his wife Shen Tung - ching built with their own hands , just next to a pond surrounded by all kinds of large trees , Cheng Yung - gwo dreams of himself sitting with a group of friends and colleagues around a fire , " alternately firing pottery and drinking wine . "

propbank.arg: possible oncoming cars around the corner

example.name: With an about phrase as arg 1
example.text: A warning to American tourists about a rogue elephant charging visitors

propbank.arg: about a rogue elephant charging visitors

example.name: Arg 1 as actual thing your warned about
Arg 0
example.text: war hero Dwight Eisenhower 's suprising warning about the influence of the pentagon

propbank.arg: about the influence of the pentagon

roleset.note: WARN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'warn' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Comparison with 'advise'. Member of Vncls advise-37.9-1. (from warn.01-v)
WARNING-N NOTES: Added due to expansion of Nombank. Comparison to 'warn.01'. Vn class advise-37.9-1. No Fn class. Framed by Katie. (from warning.01-n)
Args 1 and 2 are reversed from 'advise' but follow the pattern of'say' etc. (from warn.01-v)
